mapper.select: select a.userName,a.cycle,a.week,IFNULL(a.times,0)times,a.questionId from examinationRecord a where a.userName=#{param1} and a.cycle=#{param2} and a.week=#{param3}
select a.week from exampublish a where a.state=2
SELECT a.id,a.datetime,a.people,a.workingHours FROM maintenanceRecord a WHERE a.datetime LIKE CONCAT('%',#{startTime},'%')
SELECT a.id,a.datetime,a.people,a.workingHours FROM maintenanceRecord a WHERE a.datetime LIKE CONCAT('%',#{startTime},'%') and a.datetime LIKE CONCAT('%',#{startTime},'%')

SELECT distinct a.id,a.datetime,a.people,a.workingHours,a.content FROM maintenanceRecord a JOIN ( SELECT * FROM users WHERE projectId LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{param1},'%') )b WHERE FIND_IN_SET(b.Name,a.people) AND a.datetime LIKE CONCAT(#{param2},'%')

SELECT l.*,j.canbuxishu,j.jiabanxishu FROM (SELECT b.id,a.cycle,b.userName,b.name,d.departmentName department,b.laowupaiqian,a.jiaban,a.zhiban,a.kaoqin,a.sum score1,c.score score2,b.basicwages,b.meritpay ,f.phoneAllowance,f.yanglao,f.shiye,f.yiliao,f.gongjijin,f.zhuanxiang,f.qitakouchu FROM employee b LEFT JOIN (SELECT employeeId,cycle,jiaban,zhiban,kaoqin,`sum` FROM behavior WHERE cycle = #{param1}) a ON a.employeeId = b.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT employeeId,SUM(score) score FROM performance WHERE cycle = #{param1} GROUP BY employeeId ) c ON c.employeeId = b.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT UserName,phoneAllowance,yanglao,shiye,yiliao,gongjijin,zhuanxiang,qitakouchu FROM salary2 WHERE cycle = #{param1})f ON f.UserName = b.UserName LEFT JOIN department d ON b.department = d.id WHERE d.type != 0 ORDER BY b.department,laowupaiqian,userName)l left JOIN salary j on l.cycle=j.cycle

SELECT l.*,j.canbuxishu,j.jiabanxishu FROM (SELECT b.id,a.cycle,b.userName,b.name,d.departmentName department,b.laowupaiqian,a.jiaban,a.zhiban,a.kaoqin,a.sum score1,c.score score2,b.basicwages,b.meritpay,a.cycleDate ,f.phoneAllowance,f.yanglao,f.shiye,f.yiliao,f.gongjijin,f.zhuanxiang,f.qitakouchu FROM employee b LEFT JOIN ( SELECT h.* FROM (SELECT employeeId,cycle,jiaban,zhiban,STR_TO_DATE(cycle2,'%Y-%m-%d') AS cycleDate,kaoqin,`sum` FROM behavior ) h WHERE YEAR(h.cycleDate) = #{param1} AND MONTH(h.cycleDate) = #{param2} ) a ON a.employeeId = b.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT i.* FROM (SELECT employeeId AS employeeId,STR_TO_DATE(cycle2,'%Y-%m-%d') AS cycleDate,SUM(score) score FROM performance ) i WHERE YEAR(i.cycleDate) = #{param1} AND MONTH(i.cycleDate) = #{param2} GROUP BY i.employeeId ) c ON c.employeeId = b.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT UserName,phoneAllowance,yanglao,shiye,yiliao,gongjijin,zhuanxiang,qitakouchu FROM salary2 WHERE cycle = #{param3})f ON f.UserName = b.UserName LEFT JOIN department d ON b.department = d.id WHERE d.type != 0 ORDER BY b.department,laowupaiqian,userName)l left JOIN salary j on l.cycle=j.cycle

SELECT l.*,j.canbuxishu,j.jiabanxishu FROM (SELECT b.id,a.cycle,b.userName,b.name,d.departmentName department,b.laowupaiqian,a.jiaban,a.zhiban,a.kaoqin,a.sum score1,c.score score2,b.basicwages,b.meritpay ,f.phoneAllowance,f.yanglao,f.shiye,f.yiliao,f.gongjijin,f.zhuanxiang,f.qitakouchu FROM employee b LEFT JOIN (SELECT employeeId,cycle,jiaban,zhiban,kaoqin,`sum` FROM behavior WHERE cycle = #{param1}) a ON a.employeeId = b.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT employeeId,SUM(score) score FROM performance WHERE cycle = #{param1} GROUP BY employeeId ) c ON c.employeeId = b.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT UserName,phoneAllowance,yanglao,shiye,yiliao,gongjijin,zhuanxiang,qitakouchu FROM salary2 WHERE cycle = #{param1})f ON f.UserName = b.UserName LEFT JOIN department d ON b.department = d.id WHERE d.type != 0 and b.manager=#{param2} or b.UserName=#{param2} ORDER BY b.department,laowupaiqian,userName)l left JOIN salary j on l.cycle=j.cycle

SELECT l.*,j.canbuxishu,j.jiabanxishu FROM (SELECT b.id,a.cycle,b.userName,b.name,d.departmentName department,b.laowupaiqian,a.jiaban,a.zhiban,a.kaoqin,a.sum score1,c.score score2,b.basicwages,b.meritpay,a.cycleDate ,f.phoneAllowance,f.yanglao,f.shiye,f.yiliao,f.gongjijin,f.zhuanxiang,f.qitakouchu FROM employee b LEFT JOIN ( SELECT h.* FROM (SELECT employeeId,cycle,jiaban,zhiban,STR_TO_DATE(cycle2,'%Y-%m-%d') AS cycleDate,kaoqin,`sum` FROM behavior ) h WHERE YEAR(h.cycleDate) = #{param1} AND MONTH(h.cycleDate) = #{param2} ) a ON a.employeeId = b.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT i.* FROM (SELECT employeeId AS employeeId,STR_TO_DATE(cycle2,'%Y-%m-%d') AS cycleDate,SUM(score) score FROM performance ) i WHERE YEAR(i.cycleDate) = #{param1} AND MONTH(i.cycleDate) = #{param2} GROUP BY i.employeeId ) c ON c.employeeId = b.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT UserName,phoneAllowance,yanglao,shiye,yiliao,gongjijin,zhuanxiang,qitakouchu FROM salary2 WHERE cycle = #{param4})f ON f.UserName = b.UserName LEFT JOIN department d ON b.department = d.id WHERE d.type != 0 and b.manager=#{param3} or b.UserName=#{param3} ORDER BY b.department,laowupaiqian,userName)l left JOIN salary j on l.cycle=j.cycle

SELECT b.userName,b.cycle,b.week,b.times,d.Name FROM ( select distinct a.userName,a.cycle,a.week,a.times from examinationRecord a where a.userName=#{param1} ORDER BY a.cycle DESC ,a.week DESC,a.times DESC )b JOIN users d ON b.userName=d.userName

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT id ,maintenanceId,TYPE,content,IFNULL(DATETIME,0) DATETIME,IFNULL(people,0) people,IFNULL(workingHours,0) workingHours,IFNULL(defectNumber,0) defectNumber,(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(c.userName ORDER BY FIND_IN_SET(c.userName,a.people)) FROM users c WHERE FIND_IN_SET(c.userName,a.people) ) AS peopleName FROM maintenanceRecord a ) b WHERE b.people LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{userName},'%') OR b.peopleName LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{userName},'%') order by b.datetime desc
limit ${page},${pageSize}

select * from ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT id ,maintenanceId,TYPE,content,IFNULL(DATETIME,0) DATETIME,IFNULL(people,0) people,IFNULL(workingHours,0) workingHours,IFNULL(defectNumber,0) defectNumber,(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(c.userName ORDER BY FIND_IN_SET(c.UserName,a.people)) FROM users c WHERE FIND_IN_SET(c.UserName,a.people) ) AS peopleName FROM maintenanceRecord a ) b WHERE b.people LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{userName},'%') OR b.peopleName LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{userName},'%') order by b.datetime desc )e where e.datetime like concat (#{DayDateT},'%')
limit ${page},${pageSize}
